boardgame.name: Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies: Pacific
Axis and Allies: Pacific
boardgame.description: From the publisher's website:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies Pacific is the second stand-alone game expansion to the Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies game system. In this game, three main powers (Britain, Japan, and the US) square off against each other against the backdrop of the Pacific ocean. Japan is trying to grow her empire, either through military might or by holding off the Allies long enough to consolidate her gains._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game adds a few new rules and a few new twists to the established A_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp;A game system. Naval bases and air bases turn small, meaningless islands into vital strategic holdings. Convoy zones allow a single submarine pack to cripple an economy. The Chinese forces, while limited, are hard to crush. Japan gets her kamikazes, but will it be enough to hold off the vast economic power of the USA?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2001 Origins Awards Best Historical Board Game Winner

About us: We can be reached at: info@gamersinnaz.com The store is open 24/7/365 and can be phoned at: 480-507-0509 Street address: 1232 E Southern Ave, Mesa, AZ 85204 You can check out our history as a Power Seller on eBay at: http://myworld.ebay.com/gamers_inn or on Amazon: http://www.amazon.com/gp/shops/index.html/104-7806078-3093525?ie=UTF8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;sellerID=A2M6J42JR1XQD Our home page: http://www.gamersinnaz.com

In shrink. Weight (Funagain) = 4.4 lbs Fits in Flat Rate box = NO
Played once. In excellent condition and complete.

AXIS _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; ALLIES DICE Add an Edge to your Game with these Field Marshal Games EXCLUSIVE COMBAT DICE. Highest quality and Custom crafted with the Military insignia of each major combatant Nation of the Second World War. The Perfect Edition to your Favorite Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Strategy War Game. Each National Set includes 6 Dice each! Complete set includes 6 UK Dice, 6 Germany Dice, 6 USA Dice, 6 USSR Dice and 6 Japan Dice... A total of 30 DICE!!!

Avalon Hill (AVH 41388 / WOC 41388000B) December 7, 1941 Japan_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s great fleet is poised to launch the most infamous surprise attack in history. Their target--the American Pacific Fleet at Pearl Harbor, Hawaii. In the weeks to come, more humiliating losses will add to the sting of Allied defeats--Hong Kong, Malaya, the Philippines, Java. Axis and Allies: Pacific invites you to determine the future of the Pacific! How will the Americans respond to Japan_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s onslaught? Counterattack or careful rebuilding? Will they battle their way across the ocean island by island, or try striking directly at the heart of the Japanese empire? With the rich resources of the East Indies under its control, Japan could become unbeatable. Don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t overlook China and Burma; your enemy certainly won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t. Naval strategy and wise economic moves are both critical in waging this far-flung war across an entire hemisphere. To the familiar elements from Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies, Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies: Pacific adds convoys, island air and naval bases, kamikazes, destroyers, and the Chinese army. You also get almost 350 playing pieces representing the actual tanks, planes, and ships involved, not just generic bombers and aircraft carriers! The fate of the Pacific is in your hands. Good luck! Includes 335 historically accurate weapons and game pieces! Game Board 335 Plastic Playing Pieces National Control Markers National Production Charts Battle Board Chart Industrial Production Certificates (money) 12 Dice Plastic Chips (gray and red) Game Play Manual Ages 13+ 2-3 players
Comes complete. Minor box wear. Fun game!!

Absolutely new, shrink-wrapped and unopened. Box is undamaged in any way. This is the rare, original edition (with red-colored Japanese units) with the older (early 2000s) Avalon Hill logo on the corner of the box.

Avalon Hill - Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Pacific Language: English Players: 2 to 3 Age: 12+ Duration: 60 to 120 min Weight: 1.950 kg New -- mint condition -- unopened -- still in shrink wrap. Theme: Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Pacific is the second stand-alone game expansion to the Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies game system. In this game, three main powers (Britain, Japan, and the US) square off against each other against the backdrop of the Pacific ocean. Japan is trying to grow her empire, either through military might or by holding off the Allies long enough to consolidate her gains. The game adds a few new rules and a few new twists to the established A_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;A game system. Naval bases and air bases turn small, meaningless islands into vital strategic holdings. Convoy zones allow a single submarine pack to cripple an economy. The Chinese forces, while limited, are hard to crush. Japan gets her kamikazes, but will it be enough to hold off the vast economic power of the USA? See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

Some wear on box corner, Japanese units are burnt orange, not red (these are the units that were in the original packaging + small pkg of red infantry units). Condition - In shrink wrap, box in new condition. Payment by PayPal in advance or cash on pickup. For shipping this is considered a very large size game. The following options are available for delivery within the continental United States: 1) Local pickup in the San Jose, California area (no cost) 2) USPS Priority Mail Flat Rate - $6.60 (small), $12.65 (medium), or $17.15 (large), depending on game size. Generally very small games fit in the small box, small or medium in the medium box, and large in the large box. Box fits for some games are very snug, allowing minimal protective padding - if this shipping option is picked for such games seller assumes no responsibility for damage during transit. 3) USPS Parcel Select Ground / Non-Flat Rate Priority - varies, usually only cheaper than Flat Rate Priority for small and very light weight games (under 2 pounds), an additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. 4) FedEx Ground - varies, usually from $12 for short distance shipments of light weight games to $30 for heavy games (or multiple games up to 10 pounds) long distance shipments. This is usually the cheapest option for very large games. An additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. While expensive, this is the best method if damage during transit is a concern, as all items will be packed in boxes sufficiently sized for protective materials. Shipping rates to Alaska or Hawaii will be higher for FedEx. Games will not be shipped by any method other than a shipping box, nor unboxed or in less than complete condition, please do not ask.
